website_summaries.verdict: If you've got the money to spend, the Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti graphics card offers a great overall experience in mainstream gaming.
pros: Fastest single-GPU performace you can buy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this to run Skyrim with mods out the wazoo and everything turned up pretty high. I only have a 1080p display though, so I couldn't say what this handles like on higher resolutions.
customer_reviews.author: bcs_user

customer_reviews.title: Awsome card. Ram might be a little short.
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? This card is extremely fast, but with these newer gen games coming out I think 3GB is a little short. Maybe at least a 4GB card should be enough, preferably a 5 or 6 gigabyte card. Games like Titanfall supposedly takes 3.7 GB. So if you wanna push 1080p with all settings max 3GB might be a little short depending on the game. I hope evga and others will soon come out with a 4GB or more version of this card.
customer_reviews.author: Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Great card for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you've got the urge and are willing to splurge on this GTX all I can say is BEST MONEY I'VE EVER SPENT. This blows any game I can throw at it out the water. Watch Dogs literally had 0 issues with this card and Archeage looks amazing with it even in DX9
customer_reviews.author: Noah J.

customer_reviews.title: A power brick.
customer_reviews.text: I went on a gaming spree to find something to lag this card. I could find nothing.black flags. dayz. crysis3 and many others have fallen to the power of this card. you can get a dual cor processor and still smash if you got the RAM
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding card!
customer_reviews.text: This card handles anything I can throw at it without breaking a sweat. I've got it in an air-cooled chassis and have had no problems. It's not cheap - so probably not a great idea for an incremental upgrade... but if it's time for a new card you can't go wrong here. It's also not small by any stretch... make sure you have enough room for it before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: John Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Runs everything Smooth, and also Improved Video editing
customer_reviews.text: I had to get this for my new Gaming Build, i wanted the top of the line and paid the premium, with no regrets. If anyone wants to see my build video and some footage of this video card here's the link
customer_reviews.author: ProCoComputerRepairs

customer_reviews.title: easy installation to my sandy bridge pci-e 16x
customer_reviews.text: no bottlenecking on the older sandy bridge board 2600k that had me worried a little. negligible heat output. recently I purchased a dell u2713hm 27" monitor and this thing drives 2440 x XXXX resolutions effortlessly, flawlessly and brilliantly! great deals from amazon
customer_reviews.author: RYON HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and found all the drivers right off their website downloaded them but had to register to get the utility drivers to scan the stats of the device. The drivers all took the first try . So far so good. It definitely looks super sexy in my machine. Lets see what I have to say in a month :D
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Austin Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: Sli Madness
customer_reviews.text: these thing are a beauty and are complete powerhouse's. I'm running 2 in sli on stock clocks and I'm getting 120+fps on BF4 on ultra 1440p. I was able to easily overclock them to 1081/7090mhz on stock power setting(voltage and power target) but put them back to stock settings seeing how i'm rarely below 120fps on most my games. Pro's Powerhouse GPU Con's n/a
customer_reviews.author: paul smith

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this card.
customer_reviews.text: Pure power, works perfectly under Windows 8.1, games run AMAZINGLY great compared to my old 660 Ti SLI, you can't go wrong with this card.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Reyes Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: The thing is a beast, thinking of buying another one when the price drops. Highly recommend this graphics card. Plays most things on ultra with 60+ fps
customer_reviews.author: Tony Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent card
customer_reviews.text: Plays everything maxed out. I play Skyrim with STEP and RealVision and get at lowest 30FPS on an i5-2300+8gb RAM, normally steady 40+ outside and 60 inside(60hz monitor). I have an EVGA SuperNOVA NEX750B power supply. I suggest that anyone getting this card should opt for a better rated power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Quan D

customer_reviews.title: Best GPU
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Looks good, runs so well, has not given me any problem at all. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: SLI in supported games
customer_reviews.text: Very great card bought 2 of them and ran BF4 at 100+ fps easily
customer_reviews.author: IamKitKatBar

customer_reviews.title: Great Card!
customer_reviews.text: Best video card I've bought thus far. Runs cool and quiet. Max load temp I've seen so far is 70 degrees celcius. Planning to buy a 2nd one soon to run SLI.
customer_reviews.author: boomh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome card. Runs any game I have thrown its way on the highest settings outputting 1440p.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Dont get SC EDITION
customer_reviews.text: Functions Great, Dont get the the SC edition = its just factory overclocked. Overclock It your self & to your liking and system.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzi Humsi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance as long as you can handle the price
customer_reviews.text: I use a small footprint machine where SLI just isnt an option. With this card i can easily push the latest generation games at 1440p. If you're looking for 1440p on a single card with all the options this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: No review needed.
customer_reviews.text: Fast as hell. If you're buying this, you know why you're buying this. I'm running SLI, and the pair didn't overclock too far without a voltage increase. But that's my luck. A bit more VRAM would have been nice too. But great cards overall, they chew through EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vakil

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had it for more than a month and this thing sure is powerful. I've thrown everything I have at it and it has handled some extreme loads.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best Video Card Ever! As powerful as i expected! Works great with: Intel Core i7-4770K Quad-Core Desktop Processor 3.5 GHZ 8 MB Cache... Corsair RM Series 850 Watt ATX/EPS 80PLUS Gold-Certified Power Supp Asus Z87-PLUS DDR3 1600 LGA 1150 Motherboard
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme L Dapper

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous if you get one that works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this card and installed it, uploaded drivers from GeForce, and the card blew me out of the water with blazing frame rates. Over 220fps. Unfortunately, the card only worked for a few minutes before crapping out. Have ordered a replacement from Amazon as this one was defective. Once I get one that works, I have no doubt that I will continue to be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Titianlady

customer_reviews.title: Super speedy!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the fastest graphics cards currently in the world. The card was easy to install and plays all my games maxxed out at higher resolutions with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brutality1138

customer_reviews.title: amazing card
customer_reviews.text: fast than my 7970 ghz edition. im actually waiting for the 6gb ti version, because i want a 4k monitor lol
customer_reviews.author: linda bielski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product fast shipping tested over a month and loved the results. Thanks A-lot!!!! 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fast, fast and more fast!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing performance out of a single card. I came from a quad SLI dual GTX590 setup that had plenty of power, but this thing is even faster and uses a quarter of the power! I can run BF4 maxed out without issues although in some maps the fps do come down lower than I'd like them to be. Excellent card though, absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Raul C

customer_reviews.title: EVGA never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: This card is amazingly powerful, beats everything else on the market currently except the Radeon HD 7990 and the GTX 690, both of which belong in a separate pricing tier (higher). Much happier with this purchase than my contemporary purchase of a Radeon 290X. EVGA support is very responsive, so remember to register your device on their website!
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Hu

customer_reviews.title: EVGA GeForce GTX 780 Ti
customer_reviews.text: A little faster than the Titan. Put two of these in a computer along with the SLI bridge and I would imagine you'd have a pretty good gaming computer. I use both of mine for a parallel computing application and all the benchmarks say this is a screaming GPU.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great video card ....
customer_reviews.text: Currently considered the fastest video card on the market, this baby will give me hours of fun ...Thanks Amazon for agility.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Fonseca Stuchi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome But..
customer_reviews.text: This is superb graphics card hands down but i only got one of the games i am not sure why i only recived one game
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: EVGA GeForce GTX 780 Ti
customer_reviews.text: Great card and amazing performance. Took a while to get it shipped to Malaysia but now makes me all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Dauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing graphics card, a bit too expensive tho considering you can get a gtx980 for cheaper now..
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Christophe

customer_reviews.title: It's the size of my arm.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and works like a jewel. Makes my computer run like a goddess. The graffics can not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best GPU Graphic card out under $1000
customer_reviews.author: Ray Dog

customer_reviews.title: The Card is Good but Did Not Get the Promised Game
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the card, I am very happy with it, but was very disappointed in Amazon by not being honest with their promise of a free game code. Beware when buying as you they may not honor the deal as offered.
customer_reviews.author: BSA

customer_reviews.title: Charges a 15% restocking fee if found defective and 25% ...
customer_reviews.text: Charges a 15% restocking fee if found defective and 25% if item is found working. I know item was defective but was still charged 25% when it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: James McLemore

customer_reviews.title: EVGA GeForce GTX 780 Ti
customer_reviews.text: Basically the best GPU on the market. Overclocked mine to 1326mhz core and 8250mhz mem and it destroys every game at 2560x1440. Using it with a EK waterblock.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia greatness will not be denied.
customer_reviews.text: Very tough to write a description. If you're spending $700+ on a GPU, you should already know what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome card!!
customer_reviews.text: The GeForce GTX 780 Ti is a great card. I am now able to run all my graphic intense game at ultra settings. Games like Solitaire, Minesweeper, and the graphic hog; Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Sarath Khoun

customer_reviews.title: This GPU is a great update from my EVGA GTX 580 3GB SC
customer_reviews.text: This GPU will keep you nice and happy all the way through the next generation of console ports. And if you buy this rest assured AMD can not outperform this GPU,no matter how many crappy drivers they put out for the 290x. And the best part it has a EVGA life-time warranty. My Build: i7 4770k Asus Sabertooth Z87 EVGA GTX 780 Ti 16 Gig Ripjaws (1866 Mhz) 2x Vetex 4 256 Gb SSD's 3 TB black caviar HDD Ultra X7 CPU cooler Black Advance HAF 932 Case 1200 Watt Rosewill PSU (Gold Certified)
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good Card, but they lied about the free games.
customer_reviews.text: This card come with everything you can except from a EVGA, high quality, good warranty, just dont get it on Amazon. I make this mistake and now im regretful that i did. They offer you 3 free games with the purchase of this one, considering the card is 700 dollars, you should expect this to be easy to do, but its not. Amazon didnt send any Code as they usually do, and EVGA does nothing to fix this, all i get are promises but no one seems to know whats wrong with the codes. Im returning this card, hopefully i will get The Gigabyte Windforce on Newegg and get the codes im entitled to.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C. Moreno Gonzalez

product_meta.title: EVGA GeForce GTX 780 Ti, 3GB, 3072MB,GDDR5 384bit, Dual-Link DVI-I, DVI-D, HDMI,DP, SLI Ready Graphics Card (03G-P4-2881-KR) Graphics Cards 03G-P4-2881-KR
product_meta.description: The EVGA GTX 780 Ti is the best gaming GPU on the planet, delivering 25% more cores and exciting new technologies to take extreme gaming to a whole new level. This is pure performance accelerated, giving you the freedom to play every title at ultra settings and max resolutions on today's highest-definition displays. Boost your gaming experience with a stunningly beautiful, quiet design. You get NVIDIA GPU Boost 2.0 for manimum clock speeds, PhysX and TXAA technologies for smooth, sharp graphics, and GeForce ShadowPlay to capture all your greatest gaming moments, automatically. Whether you're playing on stunning 4K montiors at extreme settings, or multiple monitors at 2560x1600, the GTX 780 Ti provides the horsepower to drive all your next-gen gaming visual experiences.
feature_bullets: Nvidia TXAA Technology, Nvidia GPU Boost 2.0, Nvidia Adaptive Vertical Sync, Nvidia Surround, Support for Concurrent Displays, Nvidia PhysX, Nvidia 3D Vision Ready, Nvidia SLI Ready, Nvidia CUDA Technology

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
